main event: Many observers reported a strange yellow object with intelligence-controlled flight on 17 September 1965 in Michigan, Pennsylvania, and Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as starting off as a ball, then turning dark and disappearing., The observation lasted only a few seconds., The object was observed to have variable course changes., Numerous reports came from civilian and military sources., The incident was part of the Project Blue Book investigations.
witness description: various observers including civilians and military personnel
